pr_title: [Microservice] Port Mgr Support L3 Routing with Routing Rules

timeline.message: Add comments to v1 implementation emphasizing it is deplicated
PM support L3 routing and user-defined rules
Use latest RM contract for InternalRouterInfo
Fix PM UT failure related to router
Fix NeighborIP issue in Neighbor Table

timeline.bodyText: Should we take "neutron_router" as the constants format value?
timeline.author: kevin-zhonghao

replies.bodyText: Yes. This was a bug found through debugging.
replies.author: xieus

timeline.message: Return SubnetEntity list in RM GetConnectedSubnets API
